title: (x) "Modern" 70s magazine font - Trooper {Lex}
content:
Could someone help me identify this font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141116092401im_/http:/typophile.com/files/modern.gif)
author: Varglarsen

comments.content:
This looks like Trooper again, but the 'o' is different. All the other letters match. I wonder if there was an alternate.

- Lex
Yes it probaby is. Thanks again!
